items.summary: The roadmap has been updated to reflect the completion of the Dify standalone workflow product integration with Ace account and API binding. The task status has been changed to 'done' with a completion date set for January 16, 2026, ensuring clarity for future planning.

items.title: Workflow orchestration through Dify marked complete in Roadmap ðŸš€
items.summary: The status of the workflow orchestration item has been updated to 'done' in the Q1 2026 roadmap. A completion date of January 16, 2026, has been added, reflecting progress in establishing workflows as a core orchestration layer. This change enhances clarity in project tracking and planning.

items.title: Revamped Revenue Snapshot Positioning in Roadmap ðŸš€
items.summary: The Revenue Snapshot section has been repositioned to appear before the 2026 Roadmap in the page layout. This change enhances the flow of information, making it easier for users to access key revenue details prior to the roadmap. The quick navigation links have also been updated to reflect this new order.

items.title: Update video URL handling in Platform Service ðŸŽ¥
items.summary: This update modifies the video URL handling in the Platform Service by adjusting the file path for video uploads. Key changes include the addition of a new result handling for video transfers and updates to the file path structure in the utility functions. These improvements enhance the reliability of video uploads and ensure better integration with the existing system.
